name: PIG COINS
description:
Coins coins everywhere.

Help Ms. Piggy Bank collects all the coins! 

Post your best score in comment :)

---

Android: View this page in mobile and download the apk.

PC: Download the apk and play it on BlueStacks.

---

NPCs Reviews

Diamonds: Shine bright like a diamond~

Rock: The Rock is cooking!

Hammer: You can’t touch this.

Coins: Ching-ching!

Ms. Piggy Bank: Pig don’t give up.

---

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44.

Theme: Your life is currency
